strategy_overview.name: New York Open Breakout Strategy – NQ (Nasdaq Futures)
strategy_overview.description: A systematic breakout strategy designed to capture institutional moves during the New York open session using the NQ/MNQ futures contracts.

trade_bias_filter.title: Trade Bias Filter (IMPORTANT)
trade_bias_filter.rule: Only trade in the direction of bias.

bias_options.name: Price above VWAP
bias_options.condition: Price above Volume Weighted Average Price

bias_options.name: Price below VWAP
bias_options.condition: Price below Volume Weighted Average Price

bias_options.name: London session trend continuation
bias_options.condition: Trend from London session continues into NY open

bias_options.name: Higher timeframe structure
bias_options.bias: bullish if HH/HL, bearish if LL/LH
bias_options.condition: Higher highs/higher lows or lower lows/lower highs

bias_options.name: Overnight high/low taken
bias_options.condition: Overnight high/low broken before NY open

conditions: OR High is not immediately rejected
Next candle does NOT close back inside range

entry_options.method: Market entry on OR High break
Limit entry on OR High retest

conditions: OR Low is not immediately rejected
Next candle does NOT close back inside range

entry_options.method: Market entry on OR Low break
Limit entry on OR Low retest

options.description: 10–20 NQ points (MNQ: same points, smaller size)
Below OR Low (for longs) / Above OR High (for shorts)

stop_loss_rules.important_rule: Hard stop only — no mental stops

rules: After 1R reached: Move stop to breakeven or trail behind 1-min structure
If price re-enters the opening range → exit immediately

risk_management.contingency_rule: If first trade loses → only trade A+ setup

no_trade_conditions: Price chopping inside OR after breakout
Fake breakout with strong wick rejection

why_this_works: NQ has high volatility at NY open

optional_enhancements: Only trade when OR aligns with PDH / PDL
